art_deco_dining.name: Art Deco Dining Room
art_deco_dining.description: 1920s-inspired elegant dining space with geometric patterns, metallic accents, and luxurious materials
art_deco_dining.flooring: Black and white geometric marble flooring with art deco pattern inlays
art_deco_dining.walls: Deep emerald green or sapphire walls with gold geometric wallpaper patterns
art_deco_dining.ceiling: Coffered ceiling in cream with gold leaf accents and decorative molding
art_deco_dining.lighting: Crystal and brass art deco chandelier as centerpiece, brass wall sconces
art_deco_dining.furniture: Art deco dining table in black lacquer or rich wood with geometric inlay, velvet upholstered chairs with metal legs
art_deco_dining.decor: Geometric table runner, art deco centerpiece, geometric mirrors with gold frames, tassel details
art_deco_dining.table_setting: Gold flatware, geometric pattern dinnerware, crystal glassware
art_deco_dining.style_features: Geometric patterns, symmetry, bold colors, metallic accents, theatrical elegance
art_deco_dining.prompt_keywords: art deco dining room, geometric patterns, gold accents, emerald walls, crystal chandelier, velvet chairs, 1920s glamour, sophisticated dining

japandi_dining.name: Japandi Dining Room
japandi_dining.description: Harmonious blend of Japanese minimalism and Scandinavian warmth creating serene, functional dining space
japandi_dining.flooring: Light natural oak wood with subtle bamboo-grain texture
japandi_dining.walls: Warm natural linen color with soft paper texture or shoji screen accent wall
japandi_dining.ceiling: Simple white ceiling with exposed natural wood beam framework
japandi_dining.lighting: Paper lantern pendant lights over table, warm ambient LED strips, minimalist fixtures
japandi_dining.furniture: Light natural wood low-profile dining table, simple wooden chairs with soft cushions
japandi_dining.decor: Ikebana-inspired floral arrangement centerpiece, natural fiber placemats, minimal table runners
japandi_dining.table_setting: Ceramic dinnerware in soft tones, wooden utensils, simple glassware, bamboo accents
japandi_dining.style_features: Natural materials, zen principles, functional minimalism, warm neutrals, organic balance
japandi_dining.prompt_keywords: japandi dining room, light wood table, warm neutral tones, paper lanterns, zen-inspired, natural materials, serene dining space

steampunk_industrial_dining.name: Steampunk Industrial Dining Room
steampunk_industrial_dining.description: Bold Victorian-industrial fusion celebrating raw materials, exposed mechanics, and vintage character
steampunk_industrial_dining.flooring: Polished dark concrete or distressed dark wood with industrial-style area rug
steampunk_industrial_dining.walls: Exposed red brick with metal pipe accents and weathered brown textured details
steampunk_industrial_dining.ceiling: Open black metal framework with exposed ductwork and vintage gear decorations
steampunk_industrial_dining.lighting: Brass Edison bulb chandelier with multiple pendant lights, industrial track lighting
steampunk_industrial_dining.furniture: Heavy wood dining table with metal frame and riveted edges, metal chairs with leather upholstery
steampunk_industrial_dining.decor: Centerpiece with vintage machinery parts, metal candle holders, industrial wall art, copper pipe decor
steampunk_industrial_dining.table_setting: Dark metal flatware, industrial-style dinnerware, vintage glassware, copper accents
steampunk_industrial_dining.style_features: Raw metals, vintage machinery, mechanical details, weathered finishes, functional art
steampunk_industrial_dining.prompt_keywords: steampunk dining room, exposed brick walls, metal framework, Edison bulbs, industrial table, leather chairs, vintage decor, workshop dining

coastal_dining_elegance.name: Coastal Dining Elegance
coastal_dining_elegance.description: Light, airy beach-inspired dining space with natural textures and serene nautical elements
coastal_dining_elegance.flooring: Light beige limestone or whitewashed oak wood with subtle coastal patterns
coastal_dining_elegance.walls: Soft whites and light seafoam with subtle wave texture or coastal mural accent wall
coastal_dining_elegance.ceiling: Whitewashed wood paneling or light plaster with rattan or woven ceiling details
coastal_dining_elegance.lighting: Rattan or woven pendant lights, coastal brass wall sconces, abundant natural window light
coastal_dining_elegance.furniture: Light wood dining table with natural edges, whitewashed or light upholstered chairs

coastal_dining_elegance.prompt_keywords: coastal dining room, beach-inspired, light blues and whites, driftwood furniture, nautical decor, serene beach dining, relaxed elegance

maximalist_artistic.name: Maximalist Artistic Dining Room
maximalist_artistic.description: Bold, vibrant dining space celebrating color, pattern, personal collections, and artistic expression
maximalist_artistic.flooring: Mixed patterns with bold geometric or mosaic tiles, colorful area rug with artistic design
maximalist_artistic.walls: Multi-colored wallpaper, mixed patterns, jewel-tone accent walls with gallery of artwork
maximalist_artistic.ceiling: Feature ceiling with bold color, artistic murals, or decorative painting
maximalist_artistic.lighting: Ornate chandelier in mixed metals, colored pendant lights, vintage floor lamps, layered lighting

mid_century_retro.name: Mid-Century Retro Dining Room
mid_century_retro.description: Timeless 1950s-60s inspired dining space with organic forms, warm wood tones, and nostalgic character
mid_century_retro.flooring: Warm honey-brown wood with geometric or boomerang-pattern area rug
mid_century_retro.walls: Warm mustard yellow, soft teal, or coral with simple geometric wallpaper accent
mid_century_retro.ceiling: Warm cream ceiling with wood beam framework and atomic-age light fixture
mid_century_retro.lighting: Sputnik chandelier as focal point, mid-century pendant lights with tapered legs, warm glowing bulbs
mid_century_retro.furniture: Walnut or teak dining table with tapered legs, molded plastic or upholstered chairs with metal legs
mid_century_retro.decor: Boomerang-pattern table runner, retro floral centerpiece, sunburst mirror, abstract artwork

mid_century_retro.prompt_keywords: mid-century dining room, retro furniture, boomerang patterns, sputnik lighting, warm wood, tapered legs, vintage charm, 1950s elegance

moroccan_bohemian.name: Moroccan Bohemian Dining Room
moroccan_bohemian.description: Exotic, richly textured space inspired by Moroccan design with ornate details and warm spice-colored tones
moroccan_bohemian.flooring: Zellige tile pattern or ornate Moroccan-inspired ceramic tiles with intricate designs
moroccan_bohemian.walls: Warm terracotta, burnt orange, or deep crimson walls with Moroccan tile inlay accents
moroccan_bohemian.ceiling: Wooden beam ceiling with carved or painted Moroccan patterns and ornate details
moroccan_bohemian.lighting: Ornate brass or copper Moroccan lantern chandelier with pierced metalwork, wall-mounted lantern sconces
moroccan_bohemian.furniture: Carved wooden dining table with intricate detailing, ornate upholstered chairs with tassels and embroidery
moroccan_bohemian.decor: Moroccan pouf seats, kilim patterned table runner, brass trays as centerpiece, ornate mirrors

moroccan_bohemian.style_features: Ornate details, warm spice colors, intricate patterns, carved elements, exotic elegance
moroccan_bohemian.prompt_keywords: moroccan dining room, ornate details, terracotta walls, brass lanterns, kilim patterns, carved furniture, bohemian exotic, spiced atmosphere

minimalist_zen_dining.name: Minimalist Zen Dining Room
minimalist_zen_dining.description: Serene, balanced dining space focused on peace, simplicity, and essential design elements
minimalist_zen_dining.flooring: Light bamboo or light grey polished stone with zero visual clutter
minimalist_zen_dining.walls: Off-white, soft grey, or pale sage green with zero decorative elements or patterns
minimalist_zen_dining.ceiling: Simple flat white ceiling with minimal integrated lighting fixtures
minimalist_zen_dining.lighting: Soft warm LED lights, simple minimalist pendant, focus on natural window light
minimalist_zen_dining.furniture: Low-profile natural wood dining table, simple wooden chairs with minimal cushioning
minimalist_zen_dining.decor: Single piece of zen-inspired art, small bonsai or bamboo arrangement, no table clutter
minimalist_zen_dining.table_setting: Simple ceramic dinnerware in soft tones, wooden or natural utensils, minimalist placemats
minimalist_zen_dining.style_features: Tonal variation, texture emphasis, zero clutter, clean lines, zen minimalism, peaceful aesthetics
minimalist_zen_dining.prompt_keywords: minimalist zen dining room, peaceful design, soft grey palette, simple furniture, natural materials, uncluttered space, serene dining
